bubble-tower.name: Bubble Tower
bubble-tower.desc: A VR breathing game played with a custom built console that can detect human breath.

spacebeat.name: Spacebeat
spacebeat.desc: A VR rhythm game where players can control the input by just moving their head.

jext-project.name: Jukebox Extended
jext-project.desc: A Spigot plugin that allows players to play custom music using jukebox and discs in Minecraft.
